name: Lost Light (itch) (Bradlows)
description:
Made for BBD Game Jam 2022.

In Lost Light you find yourself trapped in a dark maze.
Equipped with a torch you must navigate through the darkness and find the key to the exit where salvation awaits.

But be warned: There is a reason light is so scarce in this world.


Made by:

  • Bradleigh Marks
  • Xeno Rhoda
